name: Turbo trader
description: This is car dealer-company project which provides user to authorization, search cars and book for test drive.

name: Chat App
description: This is real time chat app project which provides user to authorization and authentication, search for users, chat with them and also chat with group features.

name: Todo List
description: This is a task listing app where user can add new task and also can delete and edit that tasks.

name: Weather App
description: a basic weather app used api's for giving real time weather situations like temperature,humidity etc and also provide search, suggestion and open in new tab feature.
